> If you're looking for a book specifically on TDD you should certainly
> pick Dave's or Kent's.

Or "Unit Testing in Java - How Tests Drive the Code"
(http://www.amazon.com/exec/obidos/ASIN/1558608680).

There's a companion website offering TOC, forewords, preface and a sample
chapter for download as well as all sources:
www.mkp.com/companions/1558608680
